Summary: Was watching perseid showers spoted an object in the cup of the big dipper. it looked like a satellite but changed direction and slowed down
divs: Sighting DetailsWas watching perseid showers spoted an object in the cup of the big dipper. it looked like a satellite but changed direction and slowed down, it moved south to north then made a sharp turn to the east
trends: There have been no other sightings in Lake Station
This sighting has never been favorited.
